item.title: R and Python Talk
item.description: # R code chunk library(reticulate) wc<-"Welcome" # Phython code chunk tb="to the blog" print(r.wc,tb) ## ('Welcome', 'to the blog') cat(c(wc,py$tb)) ## Welcome to the blog
